definitions.coq: Inductive nat : Type := | O : nat | S : nat -> nat.

definitions.text: Definition of addition of natural numbers.
definitions.coq: Fixpoint add (n m : nat) : nat := match n with | O => m | S n' => S (add n' m) end.

theorem.coq: Theorem add_comm : forall n m : nat, add n m = add m n.
